name: Isleback Spawn
originalText:
Shroud
Isleback Spawn gets +4/+8 as long as a library has twenty or fewer cards in it.

rulings.text: It doesn’t matter which library has twenty or fewer cards in it, and you don’t have to specify a library. If multiple libraries have twenty or fewer cards in them, Isleback Spawn will still get its bonus only once.
